results.overview: Twelve-year-old Dre Parker could have been the most popular kid in Detroit, but his mother's latest career move has landed him in China. Dre immediately falls for his classmate Mei Ying but the cultural differences make such a friendship impossible. Even worse, Dre's feelings make him an enemy of the class bully, Cheng. With no friends in a strange land, Dre has nowhere to turn but maintenance man Mr. Han, who is a kung fu master. As Han teaches Dre that kung fu is not about punches and parries, but maturity and calm, Dre realizes that facing down the bullies will be the fight of his life.
results.title: The Karate Kid

results.overview: After some violent confrontations with his new classmates, Daniel LaRusso learns karate from Japanese handyman Mr. Miyagi, in order to defend himself.
results.title: The Karate Kid

results.overview: After discovering that his father is at death's door, Mr. Miyagi sets out to Japan, to see him with Daniel. Upon arriving, Miyagi must confront an old rival. Meanwhile, Daniel encounters a new love, and some new enemies.
results.title: The Karate Kid Part II

results.overview: Despondent over the closing of his karate school, Cobra Kai teacher John Kreese joins a ruthless businessman and martial artist to get revenge on Daniel and Mr. Miyagi.
results.title: The Karate Kid Part III

results.overview: Mr. Miyagi decides to take Julie, a troubled teenager, under his wing after he learns that she blames herself for her parents' demise and struggles to adjust with her grandmother and fellow pupils.
results.title: The Next Karate Kid

results.original_title: The Way of The Karate Kid
results.overview: Retrospective documentary on the making of The Karate Kid (1984).
results.title: The Way of The Karate Kid

results.overview: Avery, Dakota Dunn, Gets Bullied By The School Bully Rachel, Sophia Zehe. Avery's Friend, Jackson, Josiah Parks, Helps Her Learn Karate, And Take Rachel Down!
results.title: The Karate Adventure
